mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, USER_NO) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{userNo})
INSERT INTO BOARD_IMG (IMG_NO, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_LEVEL, BOARD_NO) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_IMG_NO.NEXTVAL, #{changeName}, #{fileLevel}, SEQ_BOARD_NO.CURRVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CASE WHEN (SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60 < 5 THEN '방금 전' WHEN (SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 < 1 THEN TRUNC((SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN (SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 < 24 THEN TRUNC((SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TRUNC(SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) || '일 전' END AS CREATE_DATE, COUNT, STATUS, USER_NO FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD_IMG WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY IMG_NO DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO ,BOARD_TITLE ,BOARD_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'MM/DD') AS CREATE_DATE ,COUNT ,STATUS ,USER_NO FROM BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT * FROM BOARD_IMG WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
SELECT USER_NO, NICK_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM MEMBER JOIN BOARD USING(USER_NO) WHERE MEMBER.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
SELECT USER_NO, NICK_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM MEMBER JOIN BOARD USING(USER_NO) WHERE MEMBER.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD.STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, USER_NO, BOARD_NO) VALUES(SEQ_REPLY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{replyContent}, #{userNo}, #{boardNo})
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, USER_NO, CASE WHEN (SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60 < 5 THEN '방금 전' WHEN (SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 < 1 THEN TRUNC((SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN (SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 < 24 THEN TRUNC((SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TRUNC(SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) || '일 전' END AS CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
